content:
The recent accident I've suffered with root/.git made me depressive since before yesterday (it happened at day 16)

What helped me was when I started to think: it happened because it should.

And why it should?

Probably to give me forces to change how Android works and how Linux distros at phones are a need.

Every time you delete a internal memory file of your phone from your PC, they should go to the trash bin; on Android and Linux's rm command, they are deleted directly. This have to change 1/18/22 16:02
